tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Plants (
  plant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  watering_schedule TEXT,
  irrigation_schedule TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE Plant ( plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY, plant_name VARCHAR(255), plant_type VARCHAR(100), watering_interval INT, irrigation_duration INT );
CREATE TABLE Task ( task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name VARCHAR(255), task_description TEXT, task_date DATE, plant_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES Plant(plant_id) );
CREATE TABLE Plant (   plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   plant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   plant_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   water_needs INT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule (   schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   plant_id INT NOT NULL,   water_date DATE NOT NULL,   water_quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,   FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES Plant(plant_id) );

CREATE TABLE WateringTask (   task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   plant_id INT NOT NULL,   task_date DATE NOT NULL,   task_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL,   FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES Plant(plant_id) );
